content.detailedDescription: I was driving on pershing road in stickney illinois at around 1:15 am , on saturday september 25, 2011. i noticed three flickering lights moving slowly across the sky. i pulled over to the side to observe the objects. they looked like about airplance distance. not an airplane too high or low. the three lights were following each other and began going up higher. i was in disbelief and thought about my cell phone.I took two pictures and videotaped what i could.The three circles looked like they were in a triangular form.They went from bright orange reddish to white.  it was a cloudy night so the objects slowly moved behind the clouds and i could no longer see them.
content.summary: Three flickering lights in the sky was unbelievable, i  heard no sound and saw nothing else.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1am on sunday septmeber 25, 2011 my boyfriend and i were turning from addision street to denny ave in north hollywood and noticed two groups of people walking. both groups of people were pointing and looking up at the sky. we looked as well and saw a bright, large orangish light in the night sky. first thinking it was debris from the falling satellite, we didn't regard it much, but we did keep watching as it was odd. we decided it wasn't a plane going into bob hope airport, since they have a flight curfew that had passed. it didn't have any other lights on it, just one glowing orange hued light. we see (and hear) helicopter all the time in the valley and it wasn't a helicopter either. there were no wing lights or blinking lights. 

i pulled over and we joked with two guys on the street about seeing a ufo. they asked if we were pulled over to watch it and i said yes. it was slowly ascending, leading us to realize it was not falling debris, since it was going up and not down. it didn't have a tail so i didn't think it was a meteor. i've seen pretty large, spectacular meteor displays and they typically are moving very fast and have a tail. 

it was too big and too close to be a satellite that was orbiting. if i put my hand out and closed my fingers around the diameter of it, it would be about the size of a  golf ball. it was below a low marine layer and eventually disappeared into the clouds. 

my boyfriend and i went online and watched some of the videos that are out there and we saw that some of the other videos looked quite a lot like what we'd seen, except we didn't see multiples, we saw only one single light. 

i really don't want to have witnessed a ufo. i'd love an alternative explanation.
content.summary: Orange light seen above san fernando valley

content.detailedDescription: Mr howard hope u got my voice message phone (phone number moved fi box) cms 09/27/11 08:29 cst flg  since i contacted u guys phone is acting up yet all vedeo & pics remain - sone reason couldnt retreave ur # finally got it to pull up under all calls yet not received or missed. looking forward to descretly talking to uguys . dont know why but this situation does make me nervous . since i contacted u guys im now haveing weird dreams again but not about incident. moore about what might happen with a possible return . hovever im now comitted to this and i want answers so u have my full cooperation and support . i will let u guys have full acess to vedeo & pics as long as i dont loose anything i photographed . why i need this after my insane nitemare i really dont know it i guess gives me peace of mind im not crazy....!!!! yours truely ( name moved to fi box) cms 09/27/11 08:30 cst flg
content.summary: It happened

content.detailedDescription: We were walking to our friends house, right by the university of pittsburgh, when we saw a bright light in the sky. at first it moved to quickly to be a plane or helicopter, but then it slowed down and vanished. next, we saw another orange light move across another part of the sky, and then another in a different area. finally, four of the lights came together in a diamond formation and hovered right above the city. then, they broke formation and light went away, but we could see a metallic like object in the sky that was the same circular shape as the orbs.
content.summary: We witnessed 4 orange orbs, that hovered and then joined into formation.

content.detailedDescription: I, along with 5 others, were sitting on a rooftop in the early morning hours of sept 11, 2011. i looked up at the sky in a northern direction and noticed how clear the sky was that night. i was looking directly at the bank of america corporate center building in downtown charlotte. the reason i noticed it was clear was because there were many stars above/behind the crown (top) of the building. as i was looking in that direction, i noticed a "starlike" object that began to move. at first it moved in a straight line but it became quite clear to me that it wasn't an airplane because of the change of speed. that's when i asked the others, "what is that?" the light then stopped for a second or less and then reversed direction. it continued straight for a short period and would change direction again, sometimes briefly stopping. about this time another one appeared and one of the other parties on the rooftop said "now there's two of them". as they moved they would disappear behind the crown of the building and reappear on the other side, so it was difficult to tell how far away they were. they really did look just like the stars that were in the sky behind them, except for the nature of their movements. they would both continue to move in this fashion for a couple more minutes before they finally just disappeared. it couldn't have been a airplane, helicopter or search lights because of the movements they made and the sky was clear so they weren't reflections.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights over charlotte

content.detailedDescription: Saturday night, 9/24/2011 - utah, davis county, fringe of subdivision meets desert and the great salt lake, clear star-lit night, north-northwest, observed at what i felt was at least a distance of 25 to 30 miles either still over the lake or over the desert - depending upon distance, with binoculars, an event which lasted longer than 1.5 hours (gave up and went to bed), a stationary object at elevation of at least 1-2,000 ft (guess), noticed initially at approximately 9pm and viewed w/o movement until 10:30pm, at the distance noted it was about the size of an eraser on the end of a pencil, center white light appeared to glow which was steady surrounded by 3 alternating triangular tiped or three cornered red blinking lights which were pulsating; submitting report because i just read an independent report on another web site where events were reported for nevada on sat 9/24 (same date as our event) and in utah on fri 9/23; object remained stationary the entire 90 min's my wife and i viewed it, both using binoculars w/unobstructed view; undoubtedly in the area before we noticed it and after we stopped to go to bed.
content.summary: 4 cojoined lights, clear night sky, pulsating, hovering, 30~ mi distant, over great salt lake desert, viewed x2 w/binoculars, stationary 1.5+hr's

content.detailedDescription: The first time my wife and i saw these objects, we were out in our front yard,about nine oclock at night, looking at the stars when we noticed strange lights in the sky. we counted five different sets of lights and joked to each other that it was aliens. about two hours later, we were sitting on our front porch. very bright lights appeared through the trees in our front yard. my wife said to me that a plane was about to crash in front of our house. we ran out to the street in a panic. there was a huge silver craft,that was covered in flashing lights. the lights were flashing every color in the rainbow. the object was hovering about as high as the treetops, very slowly moving toward the north. my wife and i were awestruck. the object was large, about the mass of  city bus, but sort of disc shaped. we watched the object for about twenty minutes, then it suddenly lit up bright white. it shone a huge white beam down toward us. we were so frightened that we ran in our house and hid for the rest of the night. we have witnessed these same objects on three other occasions. on another night, we followed an object that looked exactly the same for about three miles. it was moving about thirty miles an hour, just above the treetops. it turned and started coming at us. we ran from it. it was obviously following us, so we just kept driving. i was watching the sky as we drove, there were dozens more of them flying low. i counted fifteen of them, and there were a lot more than that. we drove for forty miles, while they followed us. we have observed these objects many times. they can be seen regularly in the skies over pueblo. i strongly urge anyone who is interested in ufo's to watch the sky above pueblo colorado. there are strange things going there on a regular basis. i have watched these things for hours on end, way too much to type here. please go check this out.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Multiple sightings of bizarre lighted craft. covered in flashing lights, behavior defied physics.

content.detailedDescription: 2 pictures taken on 06/03/2011 at 5:19 am, first pictures shown no cloud second picture shows a white cloud and dark object with trail.  pictures taken using iphone 4
content.summary: White cloud and dark object over boston

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing at the gulf state park pier around 7:30 pm on sunday september 25th and i saw a green fireball streak across the sky-i thought maybe it was a small aircraft and was going to fall into the ocean, but before it got to the water it just burnt out. i probably watched it for about 5 seconds.  i was wondering if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: I saw a green light orb over the gulf state park fishing pier in gulf shores,al it looked like it was falling into the ocean and then burn out.  it took about 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on highway 90 west from lafayette la, to new iberia, returning from my daughters baseball practice and like any 12 yr old, she was mad at me for no reason other than i'm her dad. all of a sudden she says "dad i just saw something very strange," and i could tell something had really startled her. i tried to act calm so she would tell me the details. she knows how i'm into anything going on in the sky, and she is a bit spooked by it. she told me she saw a yellow streak of light coming down like a meteor of sorts. when it came close to the ground it sort of disintegrated. for her to say this, it must have been really amazing.

i tried to get more out of her but i could tell she was alarmed and scared,and she is really embarrassed by my interest in this stuff.
i then stopped at the nearest gas station, got down and was looking for something to drink as i was approached by a man with a cane in his 60's who was sober as a judge. he said, "did you see that thing in the sky,"? 
he then explained what he saw which was similar to my daughters. i could tell he was amazed by it and wanted more of an explanation. he also thought it was more of a blueish color if i remember right. i was so shocked that he had witnessed it too. i think he sensed that i was sort of a ufo buff. it's almost like he knew i was. he said it looked like he saw 2 orbs when it disintegrated, which i then asked if he saw 3. he replied no.
i then brought him outside to talk with my daughter. i asked him if it was sort of like a fireball, and he said he didn't think so. but while my daughter downplayed it, i know she was alarmed and saw something very peculiar. the man validated it too. we were near an airport but, by their reaction, it was either a meteor, or a ufo. it did break up or as i said disintegrated and they were both very amazed and i could tell it was a once in a lifetime sight for the both of them. there is no doubt that something is going on in our sky's and i don't think it will be long before we really find out. 
a year or 2 ago, a good friend of mine saw something similar to this in the same area, and one of the local tv channels reported a meteor sighting at the beginning of the month. 
in closing, something very strange happened and i don't think it was a meteor.
content.summary: Daughter saw something that shocked her and breifly described it.It was a yellowish streak almost like a meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure what it was that i observed. i was standing in the back yard of a house i was working on, along with my dad, (who has terrible vision at this point unfortunately) when i noticed what i thought was an airplane reflecting the sun light as it traveled across the sky. i looked directly at the object from it's side, which was facing me to the east, as the object itself  traveled in a northerly direction. from my stand point it became obvious that the craft had no wings, but at first appeared to be all white in a cigar shape with a dark spot in the center. i did not have my phone with me to take a photo and had no field glasses either. i could hear no noise from it that i could tell and i also noted that the dark spot toward the object's center may have been due to a change or irregularity in the object's shape and construction. possibly this was an illusion created by the sun's reflection off the the object's bright white surface due to such a shape. the object held it's course at a steady air speed and entered a large cloud. that was it. a couple minutes passed as i continued to observe the sky where it went into the cloud and the surrounding sky and i just figured i better get back to work. 

i was walking back across the yard after seeing the first object disappear into a large cloud, when on the same precise flight path the first object took,  i noticed a second identical object to the first traveling through the sky. because of the sun's angle at this point, i could seemingly, more clearly, determine a much more definite shape to the object. it appeared to be like two swimming pool lane buoys attached one behind the other so that the object's center between the two buoy like sections of the object appeared defined. still no sound and the object continued on the same flight path until it too entered the huge cloud formation and just never came out that i am aware of.  

i follow roger marsh's ufo traffic report and know that several similar objects have been seen in michigan skys recently, as well as throughout the united states over the last few years.

it's odd to be the one reporting what i saw instead of reading about what others observed.

this video is exactly what i saw. 

[link moved to field investigation section/cms/tg]

i apologize for using this video without permission, but this seems to be precisely what i witnessed although there were never, in my case, two objects visible in the sky at once. the atmospheric conditions for visibility, apart from the clouds which were spaced considerable distances apart, was crystal clear.
content.summary: 2 silent ufos go into clouds and don't come out

content.detailedDescription:
We were returning from a trip from alabama headed home to louisiana so we were driving west on i-10. it was approximately between 8-9 p.M. september 25, 2011. i suddenly saw a large orb traveling from the upper left portion of the sky descend to the bottom right and then disappear (i'm assuming over water but couldn't tell). my father-in-law said "look! look! look!" there were four adults and we all saw it. it was very large and glowed brightly. i keep trying to think logically that it was a meteor or something falling out of the sky. however, we are all in agreement this was not a falling or shooting star. we could not judge its distance, but it did not appear to be very far away yet not very close either. we were traveling in the car and was currently in mississippi at the time and the object could have been in louisiana; just couldn't tell. 

the sky was very dark and very clear last night. object appeared to be an enormous, unbelievably bright orb in the western hemisphere (we were driving in this direction) and was not-so-slowly descending from left to right then disappeared. object also seemed to have a very faint, slight tail behind it. it glowed a bright white the entire time and did not appear to have any external lights. i have witnessed falling stars and a meteorites but nothing like this. otherwise a rather logical person, i must find out if anyone else other than the four of us saw this. we were not the only car on the interstate.
content.summary: Large, bright orb in seen while driving on i-10 headed west towards new orleans at approximately 8-9pm cental time

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were standing just inside the garage when i looked up pointed and said what the hell is that? my wife looked up and said i don't know,
we both noticed this bright appearing roundish object move very fast from right to left in a z pattern . then it just stopped and shot straight up and vanished.  both of us looked at each other and said that was a ufo.
the object moved without sound. i was so amazed at what i was seeing the thought to un holster my cell phone and take a picture did not cross my mind until the object had disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright roundish shape flying in a z pattern hovered then shot straight up.

content.detailedDescription: After watching the football game( pittsburgh vrs indianapolis, i went outside to smoke a cig and witnessed the prettiest shade of green that i ever saw shaped somewhat like a football come out of the west and headed towards boston. it moved in a staight line and then went out of sight. i felt kinda of happy as i enjoy seeing beautiful colors.I am retired and enjoy drawing and painting..,i cant describe the shade of green, never seen that shade before.
content.summary: A bright green object whizzed by traveling west to east

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was on the balcony at 9.47 pm and called me urgently to come out and look at this.  he was looking at what appeared to be a large craft moving very slowly just above and in front of the mountains in front of our house in vermont.  it was moving too slow for a plane, was the wrong shape, was soundless and had 3 or 4 lights that didn't blink. it took about 10 minutes to move a distance of about 5 miles before it disappeared behind the trees and we could no longer see it on its journey.
we felt so blessed to see what for us was most certainly a ufo and just wished it would turn and come closer to the house so we could see more details.
content.summary: Clearly observed craft moving slowly and quietly in a direction not generally traversed by planes or satellites.

content.detailedDescription: I was going south on whitmore lake road at the highway 23 interception. i noticed a strange set of lights in a delta formation moving east to west very slowly strait ahead at about a 40 degree angle from the road. i knew right away that these objects were not conventional aircraft. the way that they moved and the light given off by these objects is almost unexplainable. i raced to a boat ramp a few hundred yards ahead of where i had first noticed the objects, i parked my car, and i ran to the best viewing position that i could acquire. the objects kept moving very slowly, almost hovering at times, without any sound whatsoever. i tried to take pictures and videos of the objects, but it seemed that although the lights seemed bright to my eyes, they were not registering at all on my i-pod touch camera. after a couple of tries to document the event with my i-pod, i realized that it was useless. i kept observing the formation of lights move across the sky with my naked eyes. after a couple of minutes, the object that lead the formation slowly disappeared. about 30 seconds to a minute after that, the light following the lead object slowly disappeared also. the rest of the objects kept their trajectory as a new object came from behind the formation slightly faster than the rest of them. it caught up with the original delta formation as it moved through the sky, then stopped (as the delta formation kept moving slowly,) hovered for a few seconds, it came back at a higher rate of speed and it seemed to lower its altitude by a few degrees until it settled straight ahead of my point of view. as the object hovered straight in my line of sight, i ran to the edge of the river to get the best view i could. thinking back on that action, now it feels like a futile attempt to get closer to an object that was very far away from me in the first place. nevertheless, i did it. the object hovered for about 30 seconds to a minute, then it followed its original path at a slightly higher rate of speed and joined it's fellow "objects." after about another minute, they all disappeared almost at the same time..... that's the whole incident..... the whole experience, from the very first second that i noticed the formation of lights until they all disappeared only took about 10 minutes.......... this is strange to say.... but when the last bright "object" that came from behind the formation to catch up with "them" and then stopped and came back to hover in front of my line of sight for a few seconds..... i don't know?..... i felt like "it" knew that i was watching........... strange........ i hope that this helps even though it's only my experience.
content.distance: 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown, N/A
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Circle,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Unknown
content.summary: Objects moved from east to west very slow in a delta formation in the southern sky. 5-6 objects. the last one in the formation came back!

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i decided to take our dogs for a walk around the park, we had been walking for aprox a half an hour, when i noticed a plane. i was watching the plane, and it's collision lights blinking, and was waiting to hear the sound of the jet engine, as i was following the plane across the sky, i noticed a huge flash. from my position it looked like it was just above the plane, who ever was in that plane must have seen it! as the plane kept on moving, i noticed the flash again in the very same spot, but this time it looked kind of orange and not as bright as the first flash. aprox 10-15 seconds i saw it flash again, still in the same spot in the sky. my wife and i could not see the object until it would flash,each flash was a different color and a different intensity it would flash aprox every 10-15 seconds and each time the color would change from white which was the brightest intensity, to a brownish , and a yellow orange. the brownish flash kind of looked flat. the yellow-orange was kind of blurry, and more round. the white flashes were at times the size of a golf ball.And extremely bright. my wife and i often go out and watch the sky and just about every night we see what look like stars moving across the sky,but this was a first to not see the object just the flashes of light and extremely bright we watched this object for a good 45 min until we  got back home and went in the house.This object stayed in the same spot the whole time it was to the right of orion's belt and below jupiter i believe it was just about the 5 o'clock  position from jupiter, below and to the right i can not stress enough how bright and large the white flashes were
content.summary: Flashing light of different colors no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on the porch visiting my wife and got up to get some more coffee and stepped back outside and started pouring coffee in my  wifes cup then she said what the hell is that then i looked up and saw a triangle shaped object with three blue lights traveling west. it was really not going fast and had a outline shape of a sting ray shape to the object. the object did not make a sound and was amazed of the object could not figure out the object.  lost the object when it went over the house. ran off the porch and tried to see it again when it went over the house lost it because of the street lights.
content.summary: Saw a triangled shaped object with three blue lights withing the triangle

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on my front porch last night on west state street viewing the southern horizon and i saw a bright yellow light just past, and over
st. lukes hospitol to the east. it had flashing lights that resembled
track lights on a plane, but were more speratic and appeared to be
running side to side, as if down the side of a vessel. after making
its furthest approach towards st. lukes, it climbs in altitude
slightly and then starts traveling in the opposite directions. shortly
after this, i witnessed another  yellow light slowly scanning the
neighborhoods just to the west and making sudden stops and jerking
motions. after this disappears behind some houses, i see an even
brighter white light coming from the downtown area heading west
towards what now seems to be another yellow light in the west where
the last one had originated. as the white light passes in front of me,
and only about 10 city blocks away, and about 200 - 300m in the sky,
it turns slightly towards my direction while still flying towards the
other object in the sky. i can now see that it is very clearly two
objects flying side by side at a very fast pace. as they get within a
mile of the other object, it flashes and the two objects make an "s"
shaped retreat vertically and away from the object, and then head back
east before disappearing. as a "ufo enthusiast", i decided it was time
to take a walk.
 i made it to about where i saw the light scanning to the west and
didn't see anything. as i turned back to walk home, i saw another
light downtown that looked similar to the one i saw next to st. lukes,
and then disappeared behind some buildings. i walked downtown and went
to the top of a eight floor parking garage to get a higher vantage
point. from there i saw another set of lights that were so close to
each other, they looked like they could have been one object. this was
just south of the parking.. thinking back on it, they seemed to have
just come out of a parking lot somewhere off 9th st a few blocks away.
unlike the others that disappeared into the night sky, they
disappeared bellow the horizon just before the train depot. seconds
later, what i thought was a star for the last several minutes banked
west before disappearing. moments later i saw two lights flying very
rapidly about 100 m away from each other from east to west. the front
"vessel" seemed to have a cylindrical blue light standing vertically
on it, but i couldn't make out the actual shape. the rear light was
just like the bright yellow lights i had seen before. the rear light,
as they approached the train depot, sped up towards the other one
while the other one looped entirely around the depot from front to
back. the yellow light followed and they both disappeared somewhere
behind it. i walked up there and found nothing.
 this all happened between 9pm and 11pm.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Strange lights over boise, idaho 9/22/11

content.detailedDescription: On my way back from work i witnessed 3 bright white lights. the one light in the middle was constant and did not blink, while the other two on the ends blinked alternately. there also was a constant red light and appeared to be in the middle. i noticed the object because it was really low, and obviously wasn't a plane coming from the west because it was off route. at first i thought it was a helicopter with the flashing lights, then i approached it while driving in my car and it seemed to be moving pretty slow. i turned around and as i did that it changed direction (northeast) then suddenly it turned back toward the east and began to accelerate much quicker then when i was previously close to it. during the sighting i definitely knew it wasn't a regular plane. the only possible explanation was that it was a stealth, but i highly doubt that. after the sighting, i am convinced it was a ufo merely by its lights, speed, and sudden change of direction. i eventually lost sight when it accelerated towards the east. my view of this object lasted from about 3-5 minutes.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in maricopa county

content.detailedDescription: Was watching a large very high altitude airplane fly over to the north north-west and this silver ball dropped out of the blue sky behind it, followed it for a few seconds then accelerated past it and flew up back into the sky in front of it and was gone.  the jet hfad large contrails, the object had none.
content.summary: Small ball object dropped out of sky behind high altitude jet.

content.detailedDescription:
[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]

i just got this accidentally, i was recording the sun. when i played it back i saw the thing fly by. i watched it a zillion times then downloaded it and blew it up. i can send anyone the file if they want to see it and dissect it. i took a capture of the object and it is weird to say the least.
also whatever it was shot straight upwards. i was turning the camera to find lens flares. the tip of the tree is about 30 ft up.
below is a capture of the video.

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]

this is a rotated copy of the video so you can see the actual perspective since the camera was sideways. the object was shooting straight up not sideways

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Boise idaho object shooting up from behind trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling down elder road to high shoals,ga.  at the end of elder road, i noticed orange glowing lights out in a field up in the sky. i asked my husband to look and he was clueless as to what it was. we drove closer to the light s where the field was and turned the car off to see if we heard any thing. there were no noise, just 3 clusters of about 4 saucer disk like glowing things hovering. i went home(one mile away) to get my siste. they were still there and she too was able to witness. there were no street lights around... i youtubed ufo sitings near athens,ga and the saucers posted in 2008 look identical as what we saw.
content.summary: Glowing saucer like dics seen near bishop. at the end of elder road toward high shoals,ga.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting in my dad`s car talking to my sister i looked up and there it was i took same pic~s with my phone they did not come out 2 go i wish i had my good camera. it did not move at all. i has this guy to look up to see if he saw it and he did.I had to leave so how long it was there don~t no.
content.summary: It was round like a ball

content.detailedDescription:
9 red solid lights floating west to east through the normal n2south flight pattern of dfw airport. 1st hand account was of last seriers of three lights, formation type pattern with lights diming out within a few seconds of each other. i caught series of lights traveling through normal heavy traffic flight pattern of the dallas ft worth airport. typically flights travel north/south but these lights traveled through at west to east.
these where not copters, as i have one caught on same video traveling from north to south with faa lights and low alititude. i am former airwing military and have never seen anything like this before.
this was seen on friday night septemeber 23, 2011 at 23:20
content.summary: 9 red solid lights floating west to east through the normal n2south flight pattern of dfw airport

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of sept. 21st the evening sunset was beautiful so the car occupant decided to take a picture.  upon reviewing the picture, there were 4 orbs in the picture that the occupants had not previously seen with their naked eyes.  they took two more pictures to confirm what the first picture showed and sure enough they were in all three pictures.

this is just another ufo sighting in a long list of sightings.  there have been a rash of ufo sightings in the kansas city area just this past summer.
content.summary: A friend of mine took this picture.

content.detailedDescription: I called the non-emergency police phone number, and they had not received any other calls about this object, which they hadn't.  there wasn't anything they said they could do, except send a deputy out if i wanted (i didn't see the point of that).  the object almost looks like the first star that comes out, or a planet, but it was still very light outside.  the object is above the clouds--in other words, the clouds would sometimes obscure my view of it.  my wife saw the object, too, as did my little girl (who said it scared her).  i had time to get my binoculars and look more carefully.  although this wasn't much magnification, it showed that the object was more square-like in appearance, and it was very shiny...More silver than white, but it was reflecting the sunlight.  it seemed like it might be made of metal, perhaps.  this all happened when my daughter and i were drawing with chalk on our driveway, and i was feeling a little lazy so i laid down on my back and looked up at the sky.  there was definitely nothing in the part of the sky where i was looking, and then suddenly there was this mysterious object.  having used a telescope years ago, i know that a stationary object will appear to be moving because of the earth's rotation.  this object did not appear to move, in a 30-minute period of time.  my reaction was more of curiosity, and i called to my wife to look at it.  i wasn't scared, but i just wanted to report this in case others saw it, too.  i'm left wondering if it was a satellite?  for awhile, i lost sight of the object due to clouds rolling in, but approx. 30 minutes later, the clouds have mostly gone and it is still there!  maybe it is simply watching us?
content.summary: I thought it was a satellite but it didn't move. binoculars revealed square object.

content.detailedDescription:
ridgecrest ca.  i set up my home security camara pointed to the sky to maybe film the satelite that was suppose to break up on re-entry . the next morning i played back everything on the video and there we're ufo's zipping by from around 1:30 a.M. to 6:30 a.M. so cool ! 
well this was the last one and i think the best one too .  hope you like it friends !
content.summary: Had my security camara set for sattelite dismemberment and filmed 20 ufo's in 5 hrs. zipping by.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed this phenomenon only after the fact, since i was photographing the afternoon sun and couldn't look in the area long where the object appeared in the photograph because the sun was so blinding. i didn't have any contact with entities or heard strange noises when i took this image.

i was out trying to capture a decent photograph of the afternoon sun in the southwestern sky through a telephoto lens of my dslr. after i came back and reviewed my photos, an odd object appeared in one of my images. it neither looks like an airplane or a helicopter, but appears to be a saucer shaped object tilted toward the sun. it also appears to be metallic and seems to be have a dome that reflects the sun's light. i do not know what kind of object this is and it doesn't appear to be any kind of conventional aircraft.

since my dslr has a fairly high resolution, i have both a cropped version of the photograph and the original wide angle copy in order to find if there is any type of obvious details that this object has that would give away it's true identity, or verify it as a real ufo.
content.summary: Photo of unknown object with a reflective dome taken while photographing the sun

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving home that afternoon. i was in the passenger seat looking out the window as we approached this greyish-black colored sphere right next to the highway. we were heading east on state highway 45 toll road just passing aw grimes blvd. the object was to the left of us about half a mile from us, just above a neighborhood built on the access road to the left of the toll. it was so obvious to us that i couldn't help but stare at it for a few seconds... it was right above the houses, but high enough that i knew it wasn't a balloon. it was larger then a balloon, as the pictures show, about 3-6 feet from what i could tell from the distance... i could not see anything holding it up in the air, nor did i view any other objects near it. as we got closer to the object, i remembered i had our camera in my purse. i quickly grabbed my camera and snapped two pictures. this object, from the way the pictures appear, was low in the sky, about 20-30 feet above the power lines. this object had no light shining off of it, however it seemed to reflect a small area of light from what i am assuming was the sun's rays. this object made no noise, and as i could tell, did not move, spin, or rotate in any way. it just remained in the sky as if it was just there to settle itself. the texture of this craft/object appeared to be metal looking, more grey then black. as i snapped these pictures, we passed the object and i was able to get a still close up of the object... :) to this day, i do not know what that was and i would love to figure it out! unfortunately it has been 4 years since i have taken these photos, and all that i have are the files saved from my computer...However, i have been extremely curious as to what i saw, and want clarification and/or  an explanation of what it may be...
content.summary: Just hovered over the houses near the tollroad. did not move, perfect spere, and large enough i had to take a picture!
